title: GPON URI PROFILE CONFIGURATION COMMAND
description:
This command creates the URI profile for accessing the configuration server. 
These profiles are normally associated with Voip Services.
user_level:
The command can be accessed by operators with equipment privileges, and 
executed by operators with equipment privileges.
syntax: > configure pon ( no uri-prof (index) ) | ( uri-prof (index) name <AsamProfileName> [ no address | address <Gpon::UriProfileAddress> ] [ no version | version <Gpon::UriProfileVersionNbr> ] )

command_parameters.name: name
command_parameters.description: profile name mandatory parameter - a profile name - range: [a-zA-Z0-9-_.] - length: 1<=x<=32

command_parameters.name: [no] address
command_parameters.description: uri profile address that contains a Fully Qualified Domain Name (FQDN) or an IP Address (in dot notation) optional parameter with default value: "" - uri profile address - length: x<=100

command_parameters.name: [no] version
command_parameters.description: uri profile version number optional parameter with default value: 1L - uri profile version number - range: [1...2147483647]

raw:
help configure pon uri-prof
GPON URI PROFILE CONFIGURATION COMMAND
======================================

Command Description
-------------------

This command creates the URI profile for accessing the configuration server. 
These profiles are normally associated with Voip Services.


User Level
----------

The command can be accessed by operators with equipment privileges, and 
executed by operators with equipment privileges.

Command Syntax
--------------

The command has the following syntax:
> configure pon ( no uri-prof (index) ) | ( uri-prof (index) name 
<AsamProfileName> [ no address | address <Gpon::UriProfileAddress> ] [ no 
version | version <Gpon::UriProfileVersionNbr> ] )

Command Parameters
------------------

Table "GPON URI Profile Configuration Command" Resource Parameters

Resource Identifier        Description

(index)                    profile index

Table "GPON URI Profile Configuration Command" Command Parameters

Parameter                  Description

name                       profile name
                           mandatory parameter

                           Parameter type: <AsamProfileName>
                           Format:
                           - a profile name
                           - range: [a-zA-Z0-9-_.]
                           - length: 1<=x<=32 

[no] address               uri profile address that contains a Fully Qualified 
Domain Name (FQDN) or an IP Address (in dot notation)
                           optional parameter with default value: ""

                           Parameter type: <Gpon::UriProfileAddress>
                           Format:
                           - uri profile address
                           - length: x<=100 

[no] version               uri profile version number
                           optional parameter with default value: 1L

                           Parameter type: <Gpon::UriProfileVersionNbr>
                           Format:
                           - uri profile version number
                           - range: [1...2147483647]


DS-LIN-TEST-01:automationuser>#
